The Grinder

Classes and interfaces that allow user scripts to obtain services from The Grinder.

See:
          Description

The Grinder Scripting API
net.grinder.common Common interfaces and utility classes used throughout The Grinder.
net.grinder.script Interfaces and classes for use by scripts.

 

HTTP Plug-in
HTTPClient The Grinder HTTP Plugin incorporates Ronald Tschalï¿½r's HTTPClient library.
net.grinder.plugin.http HTTP plug-in that provides a pool of connections per worker thread.

 

Classes and interfaces that allow user scripts to obtain services from The Grinder.

New script authors investigating the API are recommended to start with the following classes, in order:

  • Grinder.ScriptContext
  • Test
  • HTTPRequest
  • HTTPPluginControl
  • Statistics
